error.reaction: one of the emojis failed to react!
error.missing: command not found! Check !help for more information!
error.command: there was an error trying to execute your command! 🤷‍♀️

general.title: General
general.delete: delete specified number of messages in current channel
general.role: show all users for specified role name
general.cat: send random cat image 🐈 in current channel
general.idea: add new idea to google sheet

delete.nan: your value of how many messages should be deleted is not a number!
delete.permission: you do not have permission for this action!
delete.error: there was an error deleting messages!

role.arguments: your command is missing arguments or you do not have permission!
role.missing: role does not exist on this server!

cat.error: there was an error loading cat image! 🐈

idea.success: your idea has been added to sheet!
idea.error: there was an error trying to add your idea! 🤷‍♀️
idea.channel: for adding more ideas use channel

recruit.error: there was an error loading application! 🤷‍♀️

tasklist.error: there was an error loading task! 🤷‍♀️

set.arguments: your arguments are wrong or missing! Check !help for more information!

language.error: you are already set to this language!
